SELECT A.DPOB_CD, A.SYSTEMKEY, A.HAN_NM, FCBASS0400CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, '2') AS DEPT_CD, FCBASS0300CDNM (A.DPOB_CD, A.HDOFC_CODTN_CD) AS HDOFC_CODTN_CD, B.ISS_PRPSE_CTNT, B.ISS_NUM_CPIS, FCBASS0300CDNM (B.DPOB_CD, B.CERTC_DIV_CD) AS CERTC_DIV_CD, B.PRF_ISS_NUM FROM PSNL0100 A, PSNL0550 B WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY AND B.CERTC_ISS_DT IS NOT NULL
AND A.HAN_NM = #hanNm#
AND A.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
AND A.RESN_REGN_NUM = REPLACE(#resnRegnNum#,'-','')
AND B.CERTC_ISS_DT >= #searchCertcIssDtS#
AND B.CERTC_ISS_DT <= #searchCertcIssDtE#
AND B.CERTC_DIV_CD = #certcDivCd#
ORDER BY A.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, A.HDOFC_CODTN_CD, A.HAN_NM
